content: this drawstring pom pom bag it s beginner friendly and easy to follow along for all levels this pattern includes an 6 page written pattern and a link to the video tutorial to make it as smooth as possible any questions you may come across in making this pattern will be answered inside but if not feel free to message me materials #4 medium weight yarn i used scheepjes stone washed xl #4 medium weight yarn 75 meter/82 yards per skein crochet hook size 5 mm scissors stitch marker yarn needle pom pom maker note in this pattern i used two colors gauge unblock 14 half_double_crochet x 10 row = 4 yarn needed color a 160 yards / color b 30 yards measurements 17 14 circumference x 9 tall thanks for stopping by happy crocheting
